faculty.name: Dr. Sarah Ahmed
faculty.title: Director of Orthodontics
faculty.qualifications: BDS, MDS (Orthodontics), Fellowship in Clear Aligners
faculty.bio: Dr. Sarah Ahmed is a renowned orthodontist with extensive experience in fixed appliances and modern aligner therapy. She has trained over 500 dentists in orthodontic techniques and is a certified trainer for multiple aligner systems.
achievements: Founder member of Pakistan Orthodontic Society

faculty.name: Dr. Ayesha Khan
faculty.title: Head of Aesthetic Dentistry
faculty.qualifications: BDS, PG Dip Aesthetic Dentistry, HSA Certification
faculty.bio: Dr. Ayesha Khan specializes in smile design and aesthetic dentistry. Trained internationally with HSA, she brings world-class aesthetic protocols to Pakistan. Her expertise in veneers and smile makeovers is widely recognized.

faculty.name: Dr. Michael Chen
faculty.title: International Visiting Faculty
faculty.qualifications: DDS, MSc Digital Dentistry, AI Certification
faculty.bio: Dr. Michael Chen is an international expert in digital dentistry and AI integration. Based in Singapore, he visits DICE regularly to share cutting-edge digital workflows and future technologies in dentistry.
achievements: Consultant to major dental tech companies

faculty.name: Dr. Fatima Noor
faculty.title: Senior Prosthodontist
faculty.bio: Dr. Fatima Noor is an accomplished prosthodontist with expertise in complex rehabilitation cases. Her patient-centered approach and meticulous attention to detail make her a favorite among students.

faculty.name: Dr. Robert Silva
faculty.title: International Aesthetic Specialist
faculty.bio: Dr. Robert Silva brings American aesthetic excellence to DICE. His mastery in full-mouth rehabilitation and complex aesthetic cases provides students with international-level insights.

faculty.name: Dr. Ahmed Raza
faculty.title: Endodontic Specialist
faculty.bio: Dr. Ahmed Raza specializes in complex endodontic cases and modern rotary techniques. His clear teaching style and patient approach make difficult concepts easy to understand.
achievements: Retreat specialist with high success rate

faculty.name: Dr. James Wong
faculty.title: Pediatric Dentistry Specialist
faculty.bio: Dr. James Wong is an expert in pediatric dentistry and early orthodontic intervention. His gentle approach with children and expertise in growth modification make him invaluable to the DICE team.
achievements: Published author on child dental care

collaborations.name: HSA - Hollywood Smile Academy
collaborations.description: Partnership for advanced aesthetic dentistry training with international certification.

collaborations.name: ORE Prep International
collaborations.description: Specialized training and resources for UK dental licensing examinations.

collaborations.name: Canadian Dental Licensing Board
collaborations.description: Preparation support for Canadian dental licensing pathways.

collaborations.name: DOH Abu Dhabi
collaborations.description: Training aligned with Abu Dhabi Department of Health licensing requirements.
